briefdescription.para: Adds new button, with given label.
Call this in CreateControls() of your custom editor class after all buttons have been added.
Returns pointer to one of the buttons.
Returns Id of one of the buttons.

detaileddescription.para: This is utility function to be used in event handlers.

briefdescription.para: Returns size of primary editor control, as appropriately reduced by number of buttons present.
This class can be used to have multiple buttons in a property editor.

detaileddescription.para: You will need to create a new property editor class, override CreateControls, and have it return wxPGMultiButton instance in wxPGWindowList::SetSecondary().
For instance, here we add three buttons to a TextCtrl editor:
